name: Clone Manager File
summary: Learn about .CM5 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Users looking to exchange molecule data with other users should convert their CM5 files to the .CX5 format through Clone Manager.

description: CM5 is a Clone Manager molecule format used by Clone Manager, a program used for cloning simulation, enzyme operations, graphic map drawing. Each CM5 file stores molecule name and size and sequence data. It may also include description, notes, features, enzyme sites, and primer sites
